TRANSMISSION.HEADER: WARNING - Incoming Signal - ID: 0to2340in.01sec - Major Rayburn -
TRANSMISSION.BODY: There it is Ace. Look at all that booty - over thirty tons of pure hotpants, and it's all ours.

TRANSMISSION.HEADER: WARNING - Incoming Signal - ID: Local Computer - BENNY -
TRANSMISSION.BODY: ALERT - my ethics chip is melting.

TRANSMISSION.HEADER: WARNING - Public Signal - ID: 0to2340in.01sec - Major Rayburn -
TRANSMISSION.BODY: Attention cruiser Dakota, this is Major Raybrun. Yes, THE Major Rayburn. You're hotpants now belong to us.

TRANSMISSION.HEADER: WARNING - Public Signal - ID: l8trman - Frank Kenworthy -
TRANSMISSION.BODY: Awww man, give me a break, it's my first day!
